coastline.title: Spawnpeek kitchen
coastline.description: Scan above every now and then to check if there are not above the hatch. Dont jump out to soon, check if the enemy is standing still

coastline.title: Spawnpeek kitchen
coastline.description: Scan above every now and then to check if there are not above the hatch. Dont jump out to soon, check if the enemy is standing still

coastline.title: Runout ruins
coastline.description: Shoot the barrier 19 times. A barrier will break after being shot 20 times. Make sure to spread out all shots, arround 4 shots for each horizontal barrier line

villa.title: Runout bathroom
villa.description: Break the window and glass in advance, so there is no sound queue jumping out. Go around 2:54 or 2:56

bank.title: Runout lobby
bank.description: Break the window and glass in advance, so there is no sound queue jumping out. Throw the camera around 2:50

clubhouse.title: Construction Site
clubhouse.description: Punch the wall before the prep-fase is over

outback.title: Runout gas station
outback.description: Jump out instantly, open window before prep-faec is over. Walk to the corner, look at the brown spot for the vault prompt

theme-park.title: C4 below cafe
theme-park.description: The idea is that the enemy can not see the camera, so when they walk in, you blow up the c4
